project1.title: Get Things Done
project1.description: Every developer worth their salt codes a To-Do app at some point. This one is mine. It utilizes full CRUD methods to interact with Firebase.
project1.technologiesUsed: Webpack, Axios, Firebase, JavaScript, ES6 Modules, SASS, Bootstrap

project2.title: Whaddup
project2.description: A group project focused on the concepts of JSON, where we created a Windows 95-themed chat application in single page format.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap 4, AJAX, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Lego Builder
project3.description: A small lego-man builder app. User can make a lego person creation, randomize a lego person, or save individual lego characters. The name of each lego creation corresponds to each lego piece selected. As user swaps out lego parts, the name will change to reflect the newly chosen piece.
project3.technologiesUsed: Webpack, JavaScript, ES6 Modules, Axios, Firebase, Bootstrap, SASS
